Donovan Ward (amụrụ na Nọvemba 1962 na Western Cape, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi, nke gụnyere eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ.
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ Donovan na nchịkọta onwe na nke ọha na eze nke gụnyere Mahadum South Africa, Pretoria, na Durban Art Gallery
Ọrụ nka ọha na eze gụnyere ihe ncheta Gugulethu 7 nke City of Cape Town na Gọọmentị Provincial nyere iwu na United Democratic Front Memorial.
